1.content:
You were an odd human, when you were a child you were cursed, causing you to shrink to an inch tall. In a world full of dangerous beings, you were always in danger of being crushed, captured or eaten.

What kind of being will you encounter today?
1.title: The Beginning

choices: Keep You Safe (Prince Devin is Kind)
Have My Way With You (Prince Devin is Cruel)
Whatever I Want (Prince Devin is Mischievous and Playful)
11.content:
Prince Devin of the Terra Kingdom was undoubtedly a suave, powerful young man. His blonde hair reached down to his shoulders and his striking blue eyes and plump lips made everyone swoon over him, not to mention his toned and tanned physique.

You were in complete darkness as you slid back and forth inside of what you could only assume was a box. A muffled voice could be heard from the outside...

"My Lord, your pet has arrived."

"Pet?!"

A bright light enveloped you as the top was removed from the box... and there he was, Prince Devin himself, looking down at you with a cocky smirk.

"Hello there, little one."

"W-What's going on?" You stumbled back as Devin reached into the box and wrapped his warm hand around you.

"I'm sure that you must be quite confused, but allow me to explain why you're here. I've heard about you, the people call you a walking, talking insect. I was intrigued by you, so I simply bought you for myself."

"Bought me...? I... what in the world is that supposed to mean?"

"It means that I paid for your capture, and now I own you. You belong to me, isn't that a wonderful gift for you, my little pet?" Devin winked as his mouth curved into a smug grin.

"Wh-What are you going to do with me?..."
11.title: A Royal Pain

113.content:

"I bought you little guy, that means I can do as I please. My royal duties are proving to be a bore so I'll need a pet to entertain me, and a cute one at that~"

You blushed despite the worry. "H-how am I supposed to entertain...you."

Devin smirked as he rose so his torso loomed over you. The prince then began to slip off his silk white shirt and expose his tan muscles. Your blush darkened as you took in his six pack and large pecs, Devin's biceps flexed as he ran his fingers through his blond hair and licked his lips.

You absentmindedly nodded and watched as the prince scooped you up into his tan palm. Holding you between his thumb and finger, Devin cooed at you as he smirked.

"Seeing as you admire my physique, why not get a closer look since I'm such a nice master~"

113.title: A Michivious Prince

1131.content:

"Are you comfortable?" Devin asked in a sly tone.

You nodded, a bit too enchanted by the giant's muscles to speak.

"How cute, you can't even speak! I should have expected this, I suppose, I AM quite dreamy." Devin continued to toy with you.

The giant blond stretched his muscular arms up, squeezing you in between his pecs tightly before letting his arms drape over the sides of the bed. Devin then began to bounce his mountain-like pecs, in turn bouncing you back and forth between them. You were squished and tossed between your new owner's impressive muscles.

"What is that rancid stench...?" Devin sniffed the air before lowering his head near his armpit, giving it a quick sniff. "Say, little pet, how about I let you explore my body in full?"

You looked at him with a bit of confusion... and worry, but also excitement, part of you did want to explore every crevice of his attractive body.

"S-sure..." You said as Devin's pecs tightened once again, pinning you between the warm masses.

"Excellent.... I'm going to take a bath, as royalty it's shameful to walk around smelling like a homeless peasant... and I've selected a new washcloth that I'd like to test out." Devin winked at you charmingly.

Your face turned entirely red... he was going to use you to clean his body? You didn't know if you should be disgusted and terrified or grateful and excited.

"Now then, I'll have a servant prepare my bath..."
1131.title: A Journey to the Pecs

11331.content:
Prince Devin began to lower you towards his armpit, you trembled in fear as you watched the massive pit get closer and closer. Devin had a smug look across his face as you attempted to wriggle free from his grasp.

"It's pointless, my adorable little pet." Devin said in a taunting tone before you were finally pressed against his humongous armpit.

Your tiny body sank into the soft, squishy, hairy flesh underneath his arm. The skin smelled lightly of musk, and was damp. You were rubbed up and down Devin's armpit as you were forced to smell the prince's body odor.

14.content:
You were sitting on a rock at the edge of the ocean, staring out into the vast seas, a little more vast to you since you were only one inch in height. You sighed as you stared at the fish below, wishing you could jump in and have a relaxing swim, but you would ultimately end up being eaten by some sort of sea creature if you did.

You stood up and turned around, ready to go back home... but a large wave suddenly hit the rock you were on, pulling you into the ocean! You screamed as you fell into the water, all of the fish began to swim towards you as you struggled to stay afloat... and then you saw a larger creature swim up from the depths as well. You looked up, not wanting to see what kind of monstrosity was about to eat you, and then, you found yourself in a dark cave of sea water... you screamed before being spit out onto a... human hand?

You looked up to see the handsome face of a confused young man, his long brown hair shimmered as water dripped down his muscular pecs and arms.

"What... are you?" He asked "I thought you were a small fish, I was about to swallow you whole before I heard you screaming in my mouth!" He laughed.

You were just as confused as he was, until you looked down to see a green tail swishing in the water.

"W-wait a second... you're a merman?!" You gasped.

"Yep, I sure am little fella! Name's Dover, what the heck are you? I've never seen a human this tiny before, you're kinda cute!" Dover ruffled your hair with his large finger.

"I-I was cursed a long time ago... and now I'm stuck like this." You explained.

"Hmmm.... I like you! I'm gonna keep you!" Dover wiggled his tail happily.

"K-keep me?!"

"Mhmm, you're gonna be my special little human friend, doesn't that sound fun? I can use magic, I'll give you the power to breathe underwater and everything!" Dover said excitedly.

What will you do?
14.title: In Too Deep

142.content:
"No way! You can't do that!" You shouted angrily, but your anger turned into fear as Dover frowned down at you.

"Yes I can! I found you! If you don't like it then maybe I'll just eat you anyway!" Dover opened his mouth and dangled you over it.

Dover dropped you back into his mouth and swished you around, putting his hands on his hips as you were tossed around by his giant tongue.

"N-no, stop! You can keep me.... just please don't eat me!" You screamed.

Dover spat you out again, "Good choice little guy, don't make me mad again or I'll really eat you up!"

"Okay... I'm sorry..." You sighed in relief.

"Aw, how could I stay mad at someone so little... and tasty?" Dover laughed.

You blushed as Dover licked his lips.

"You're not really gonna eat me... are you?" You asked nervously.

"Not unless you're a bad little pet! But.... I might pop you in my mouth for a little taste sometimes. You're just so delicious!"

You shivered at the thought of being in the huge merman's belly... but maybe you could get used to being the attractive creature's pet.

"Now, time to go!" Dover said as he waved his hand in front of you. "There, I put a spell on you so you can survive underwater. Now where to keep you..."
142.title: Refusing the Giant Merman

choices: Kindly michivious ( he'll be friendly but joking )
Cruel ( he wants to show how cruel a demon can be )
151.content:
( https://www.deviantart.com/suyohara/art/... , just the maroon guy )

Dyon was a demonic lord who after being bested in a fight was banished to the surface world, or the world where humans reside. Stuck on the surface, he is force to stay in his humanoid form that still differs heavily from a human. Reaching heights of 8'3 and having a maroon body of bulking muscles that a man could only dream of having.

Despite these assets, Dyon was trapped in the forest of resurgence unable to escape and only encountered humans when they passed by.

You were one, but didn't just pass by.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The events of the last few hours were a blur. All you could remember was falling out of your parents cart and into the stream. Luckily you survived but ended up in a strange forest with mysterious blue orbs floating around the leaves and a strange tint to the sky.

As you explored, you came across a large rock in the center of a clearing. A concerning issue was at hand as you saw numerous foot prints embedded in the ground, much larger then normal and with a strange claw like addition to the toes. Your attention was altered when the area around you darkened and a deep voice called out from above.

"Well now, aren't you a strange thing?"

Turning around and looking up, you gasped as on the rock sat a towering mass of deep red muscle leading to a face with a curious smile on a head of black hair and horns. The only clothing worn by the demonic being was a brown loincloth rested between his thick thighs.

Getting a surge of panic, you turned and tried darting away only to stop as a large red mass slam down in front of you with a boom that made you fall onto your butt. The appendage was long and had black pointed nails at the end, meaning that the demon stopped you with his foot. Another boom came behind you as the giant now had you between his feet.

Looking up, a blush formed as the two maroon towers led to a dark area uncovered by the loincloth. From above the horned being looked over his pecs as he slyly smirked and scouted down to bring his hulking body lower.

"Hey come now I didn't even introduce myself yet!", the demon said in a joking manner. "I'm known as Dyon, I would give you my full title but it doesn't really have any meaning anymore."

You simply stared as Dyon held his buff body over you. Fear gripped you as any moment he could lower himself furthur and crush you under his bulk.

"P-please just can I go!?", you desperately cried out.

Dyon raised an eyebrow but simply grinned. "Hmm, I'm hurt human. I don't really get any company and when an interesting human shows up you want to leave me?"

The demon chuckled and bounced his hairy pecs." Nahh, you and me are gonna spend some time together! Just a demon and his little buddy~"

How was Dyon going to act?
151.title: A Demonic Encounter

1511.content:
Dyon reached his gigantic hand down and scooped you up, bringing you to his handsome face.

"P-please don't hurt me..." You gulped as the warm hand trapped you in a tight grip.

"Hurt you? Now why would I want to do that? I just want to have a bit of fun with my new 'friend', is that so bad?" Dyon asked with a playfully evil smirk.

Dyon sat down on top of a rock and held you in front of his bulging pecs.

"Do you like my body, little one?"

"Y-yeah, you're really... really huge." You could imagine yourself being crushed into a pulp between the two humongous, hairy pecs.

"Maybe you'd like to explore my muscles, hmmm? Or maybe I'll stuff you somewhere myself." Dyon licked his lips and pinched you between his giant fingers, rolling you around "I have to say, you're quite cute for a human."

You blushed at the comment, "Thanks... you're handsome for a... demon." You said awkwardly.

Dyon lifted his free arm and flexed his bicep, the muscle bulged and veins popped out as he cockily wiggled his eyebrows.

"Now then, which part of my body do you wish to see up close, little companion? Or shall I choose for you?"
1511.title: The Mischievous Demon

15113.content: "Oh my, how brave of you to let a giant demon choose your fate." Dyon grinned down at you "I think you'll be comfortable..."
15113.title: Let him choose

The boy had the appearance of his sixteen year old body with a lean muscle built under a blue yukata. However as a ghost his skin is chalk white as well as his spiky shoulder length hair and his eyes are a sharp blue.

Itazu enjoys messing with any living beings that come through the forest. The boy can make his ghost form physical while in the forest.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You walked through the dark forest unnerved at the scary aspects. While your father was carrying you feel out of his pocket and were stranded before the forest.

After walking through the blades of tree height grass, you found a sickly looking tree stretching into the sky. Before you could observe furthur a chuckle rang out.

"Hehe didn't know bugs could be ghosts~"

Looking up, one of the branches now had someone sitting on it. A ghostly young boy was smirking while swinging his large feet. The ghost suddenly floated down and landed close enough to that you were between his feet. You took notice that the boy's feet had a stench even though he may be a ghost. You hurt your neck as you looked up at the smirking face.

"Um I-I'm not a bug!"

Itazu's smirk turned toothy.

"Well if your not a bug.....
15341.title: A Ghostly Encounter

info.brief_description: You're only one inch in a fantasy world... will you be able to survive?
info.description:
You live in a world full of mystical creatures, but the only thing that's interesting about you is that you're only an inch tall. What kind of situations will you get into when you run into one of these giant creatures?

Rules:

Male macros only.

Any fetishes are welcome, but refrain from scat please.

You can make up your own creatures if you want, or write about regular humans.

Have fun.
